entries.no_valid_schematic: Warning: you do not have a draft schematic that can be used in this station.
entries.schematic_not_removed: Schematic %TT was not removed from the station.
entries.schematic_removed: Schematic %TT has been removed from the station and been placed in your datapad. Have a nice day!
entries.schematic_not_added: Schematic %TT was not added to the station.
entries.schematic_added: Schematic %TT has been inserted into the station. The station is now ready to manufacture items.
entries.examine_prompt: Ingredients required to manufacture an item at this station.
entries.no_schematic_examine_prompt: There is no schematic being used in this station.
